# `AgentMuScheduleShift` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startOffsetMinutes | `number` | Yes | The start offset of the shift, relative to referenceStartDate at the top level |
| lengthMinutes | `number` | Yes | The length of the shift in minutes |
| activities | [`AgentScheduleShiftActivity[]`](agentscheduleshiftactivity-definition.md) | Yes | The activities associated with this shift |
